## Exercise 1


```{r ex1}
# Here is the code chunk for exercise 1 without errors

data(ilri.sheep)
sheep <- ilri.sheep
sheep94 <- sheep %>% 
  filter(year == 94, !is.na(weanwt)) %>%
  mutate(wtchange = weanwt - birthwt)%>%
  group_by(gen) %>% 
  summarize(mean_birthwt = mean(birthwt),
      mean_weanwt = mean(weanwt), mean_wtchange = mean(wtchange), n= n())
head(sheep94)
```
